description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Microsoft Virtual Machine Bus (VMBus) denial of service vulnerability:

1. Apply the following KB updates corresponding to your build:
   - KB-5036910
   - KB-5036909
   - KB-5036896
   - KB-5036894
   - KB-5036893
   - KB-5036892

2. Ensure your system is running one of the affected build numbers:
   - 10.0.19045.4291
   - 10.0.19044.4291
   - 10.0.22631.3447
   - 10.0.22000.2899
   - 10.0.22621.3447

3. Restart your system after applying the updates to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
This update addresses a CWE-822 issue known as Untrusted Pointer Dereference, which could be exploited for denial of service. Be sure to backup important data prior to applying updates.

For further information, consult the Microsoft documentation at the provided link: [MSRC Update Guide for CVE-2024-26254](https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2024-26254).
